mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, SEQ, START_DATE, END_DATE, ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY, RESERVER1, RESERVER2, RESERVER3
mapper.insert:
insert into t_overdue_log
ID,
APP_ID,
SEQ,
START_DATE,
END_DATE,
ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY,
RESERVER1,
RESERVER2,
RESERVER3,

#{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},

mapper.update:
update t_overdue_log
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY = #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_overdue_log set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY = #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.* from ( select * from t_overdue_log where APP_ID = #{appId} order by seq desc ) a group by a.APP_ID
